meanings.definition: A technique in printing for adding shading or texture by overlaying small dots of ink.
meanings.sent1: The artist used benday to create shadows in the comic book.
meanings.sent2: The printer applied benday to give the illustration more depth.
meanings.sent3: The benday dots on the page looked like a secret code to decipher.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a masterpiece, with benday dots forming a beautiful gradient.
meanings.sent5: The benday technique made the image pop off the paper.

meanings.definition: To apply the benday technique in printing.
meanings.sent1: She will benday the poster for the art exhibit.
meanings.sent2: They benday the illustrations to enhance the details.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally bendayed the wrong section of the design.
meanings.sent4: The artist bendaying the picture was a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: Bendaying the image made it more visually appealing.

meanings.definition: A pattern or texture created using the benday technique.
meanings.sent1: The book cover featured a benday pattern that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The benday texture on the artwork added a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The benday design on the fabric looked like tiny raindrops.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a benday pattern that shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The benday pattern on the wall gave the room a modern feel.
